intro_questions.text: Can you spell your family name, please?

main_questions.text: What do you like to do in winter?
What do you wish you could do?

respond_situations.starter_line: Where do you want to go?
respond_situations.description: You are at a bus stop.
You see a shirt in a shop. You want to ask the price.

respond_situations.starter_line: What would you like to drink?
respond_situations.description: You are at a café. You can choose a drink.

respond_situations.starter_line: Do you want to watch a movie?

ask_situations.instruction: You are at school. Ask your friend for help with homework.
You want to ask a classmate for help. ..
You are shopping. Ask the shopkeeper for the price of a shirt.

listening_script.text: I do my homework every day. I sit at my desk. I use my books and pencil. Homework is important for school. I finish my homework before dinner.

questions.question: What do you do every day?
When do you finish your homework?

monologue.topic: Talk about your favourite TV show

follow_up_questions.question: What is your favorite character in the show?
When do you watch this TV show?
Why do you like this TV show?
